subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: At the Austrian Grand Prix in 2002, the Italian team controversially ordered one of its drivers, Rubens Barrichello, to let his teammate, Michael Schumacher, pass him so he could win the race.
snippet: At the Austrian Grand Prix in 2002, the Italian team controversially ordered one of its drivers, Rubens Barrichello, to let his teammate, Michael Schumacher, pass him so he could win the race.
